ear.name: ear
ear.transformationDescription:
They quickly shrink down into little nubs as most of the external cartilage shifts down into the sides of [npc.her] head. #IF(npc.getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_FLESH) A layer of [npc.earFullDescriptionColour] grow to cover [npc.her] now-fully-internal ears, #ELSE Just like the rest of [npc.her] body, [npc.her] now-fully-internal ears are made out of [npc.earFullDescription], #ENDIF and as the transformation finishes, [npc.sheIs] left with the ears of a snake-morph.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldSnake(internal, scale-covered snake ears)], which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription].
ear.bodyDescription: [npc.Her] ears are an internal part of [npc.her] head, and are surrounded by a layer of [npc.earFullDescription(true)]. #IF(npc.isPiercedEar()) They have been cleverly pierced so as to allow [npc.herHim] to wear ear-specific jewellery.#ENDIF
